attributes.action: Extortion of the price 0844 phone numbers to Doctors Surgeries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think these premium rate prices are extortion as this affects all people especially those who are already suffering poverty and can ill afford this.The surgeries do not benefit from these charges,the private company makes the profit

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
